snippet.title: My Lovely Empress 3D Steam Next Trailer
snippet.description:
From June 10 - 17 only, experience a sneak peek at the might of the imperial throne. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2052990/My_Lovely_Empress/

Manage the Crimson Empire and its competing factions, while using the citizenry as fuel for the darkest of magics. Summon the mysterious and deadly Yaoguai to do your bidding, and learn the secrets of their supernatural powers!
